titles.title: Federal Medical Malpractice Insurance Stabilization Act of 2003
To provide for a Federal program to stabilize medical malpractice insurance premiums.
Federal Medical Malpractice Insurance Stabilization Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Federal Medical Malpractice Insurance Stabilization Act of 2003 - Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide a program of automatic reinsurance from a national fund for medical malpractice insurance coverage claims in excess of $250,000.Directs the Secretary to establish the terms and conditions of such a program, including the premium amount to be charged for such reinsurance.
